Segment.name: SST
Segment.comment: To provide information concerning the student's eligibility to return to the reporting institution, enrollment status, residency for fee purposes, and date and type or status of high school graduation

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier1
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod1
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier2
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod2
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: LevelOfIndividualTestOrCourseCode
Field.comment: Code identifying level of course, test, or individual

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
